data.title: GL: Family Trees
data.text:
somebody asked me to post some family trees..

I will try my best...but feel free to help...

sorry, I am not going to make the branches and all that...

The Bauers

----------

Frederick "Papa" Bauer and Mama Bauer

Children: Bill, Meta, and Trudy

Grandchildren: Michael, William Edward, Hillary, Chuck

Great Grandchildren: Hope, Rick, Michelle

Great Great Grandchild: A-M Spaulding

Bill Bauer

Wives: Bert Bauer (what is her maiden name) and Simone Kincaid

Children: Mike and William Edward with Bert; Hillary with Simone

Grandchildren: Hope, Rick, Michelle

Great Grandchild: A-M Spaulding

Meta Bauer

Husbands: Ted White, Joe Roberts, and Bruce Banning

Son: Chuck

Trudy Bauer

Husband: ?, but she left town with him

Michael Bauer

Wives: Robin Holden (annulled), Julie Conrad, Leslie Jackson, (is that all)

Daughter: Hope

Grandson: A-M Spaulding

Edward Bauer

Wives: Leslie Jackson, Holly Norris, Rita Staptleon, Maureen Reardon

Children: Rick with Leslie; Michelle with Claire Ramsey

Hope Bauer Spaulding

Husband: Alan Spaulding

Son: A-M Spaulding

Rick Bauer:

Wives: Meredith Reade, Beth Raines (annuled), Annie Dutton

Other Bauers:

Jack and Lanie Bauer; Jack is the grandson of Papa Bauer's brother

Johnny and Lacey Bauer: Jack and Lanie's children

A-M can be with the Spauldings....

The Spauldings

--------------

Brandon and Penelope Spaulding

Children: Alexandra and Alan; Brandon also has a daughter Sharina with

his mistress Sharina

Grandchildren: Amanda, Phillip (adopted), A-M, Lujack, Nick

Great Grandchildren: Lizzie

Husbands: Baron Von Halkein and Roger Thorpe

Children: Nick and Lujack with Eric Luvonaceck

A-M with Hope

Grandchildren: Lizzie

Husbands: Ben McFarren and Gordon Middleton

Daughter: Lizzie with Beth

Alan-Michael Spaulding

Wives: Harley Cooper, Blake Thorpe, Eleni Andros

Nick McHenry Spaulding

Wife: Mindy Lewis

Henry and ?

Anthony James

Peter with Billy

Dinah Marlor

(adopted) with Vanessa
